thread.title: IT Employees Access Highly Sensitive Congressional Democratic Accounts
thread.title_full: IT Employees Access Highly Sensitive Congressional Democratic Accounts

author: Nickarama
title: IT Employees Access Highly Sensitive Congressional Democratic Accounts

organizations.name: daily caller news foundation investigative group
house permanent select committee on intelligence

text:
IT Employees Access Highly Sensitive Congressional Democratic Accounts 0 shares 09:57pm February 4, 2017   
Three brother who held IT positions for members of very sensitive Congressional committees were fired for suspicion of improperly accessing congressional computer networks without authorization. 
From Daily Caller: 
Brothers Abid, Imran, and Jamal Awan were barred from computer networks at the House of Representatives Thursday, The Daily Caller News Foundation Investigative Group has learned. 
Three members of the intelligence panel and five members of the House Committee on Foreign Affairs were among the dozens of members who employed the suspects on a shared basis. The two committees deal with many of the nation’s most sensitive issues and documents, including those related to the war on terrorism. 
They also worked for members of the House Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence. 
Here’s a picture of brother Imran Awan with former President Bill Clinton. 
The brothers are suspected of accessing the accounts as well as stealing equipment from Congress. 
According to the Blaze: 
Jamal worked for Rep. Joaquin Castro (D-Texas), a member of both the intelligence and foreign affairs panels and Rep. Cedric Richmond (D-La.) who is on the Committee on Homeland Security. 
Imran did work for Reps. Andre Carson (D-Ind.) and Jackie Speier (D-Calif.), both of whom serve as members of the intelligence committee, while Abid worked for then-Rep. Tammy Duckworth (D-Ill.), a member of House committees on oversight, armed services and Benghazi, and Rep. Lois Frankel (D-Fla.), a member of the foreign affairs committee. 
Rep. Debbie Wassermann Schultz (D-Fla), who was already compromised in the DNC hack, may also have been compromised. 
The investigations are ongoing and at least one brother had a criminal record. 
All the brothers were making in excess of $160,000 in their positions. 
Unbelievable that this could happen, yet again to Democrats. 
Where is the security? LIKE this article? I hated this article. I'm a liberal.
